titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31992D0161 English
92/161/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 March 1992 amending the Commission Decision 92/160/EEC establishing the regionalization of certain third countries for imports of equidae

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: 92/161/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 March 1992 amending the Commission Decision 92/160/EEC establishing the regionalization of certain third countries for imports of equidae
body.p: COMMISSION DECISION of 9 March 1992 amending the Commission Decision 92/160/EEC establishing the regionalization of certain third countries for imports of equidae (92/161/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Economic Community,

Having regard to Council Directive 90/426/EEC of 26 June 1990 on animal health conditions governing the movement and import from countries of equidae (1), as amended by Directive 91/496/EEC (2), and in particular Article 13 (2), thereof,

Whereas, by Council Decision 79/542/EEC (3), as last amended by Commission Decision 92/160/EEC (4), a list of third countries from which Member States authorize imports of bovine animals, swine, equidae and fresh meat, including meat products has been laid down;
Whereas, by Commission Decision 92/160/EEC the regionalization of certain third countries included in the abovementioned list for imports of equidae has been established;
Whereas some parts of the territory of Russia meet the required conditions whereas it is therefore appropriate to add Russia to the Annex of Decision 92/160/EEC;
Whereas the measures provided for in this Decision are in accordance with the opinion of the Standing Veterinary Committee,
The following is added to the Annex of Decision 92/160/EEC:
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
(4) See page 27 of this Official Journal.
